title: Reading a File
description: In this lab, we add functionality to read the file specified in the file_path argument by using the fs::read_to_string method, and then print the contents of the file.

meta.title: Reading a File: Rust Programming Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to read a file in Rust programming language with step-by-step instructions and code examples.
meta.keywords: Rust, programming, file reading, tutorial, code example
